availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Ballard County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Son of R. Sullenger and J. Sullenger. Married to Martha E. Porter Sullenger. Father of George T. Sullenger, Mary C. Sullenger, and John A. Sullenger. Farmer in Ballard County in 1850.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Ballard County, p. 259A.
Tenth Manuscript Census of the United States (1880), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Crittenden County, Hurricane, p. 24.
